recipes.title: Recipes
recipes.help:
Where you can add, edit and view recipes. A recipe is simply
a list of foods which can be used to alleviate the burden of having to re-enter
the same information if you tend to eat the same things every day.

foods.title: Foods List
foods.help:
Where you can add, edit and view foods.
You can also load a premade food list in the CSV format,
and save your content as CSV.

deleteDialog.title: Confirm
deleteDialog.message: This action cannot be reverted. Are you sure?

meals.title: Meals
meals.help:
Where you can create meals from your foods and recipes list.
Calories and macronutrients are automatically computed
based on the information you provide on Foods and Recipes tabs.
meals.constant: Keep this meal the same for the next days
meals.active: Include this meal's calories in the daily total

meal_history.title: Meal History
meal_history.help:
View past meals and nutrition information.
No editing is allowed, but you can toggle the constant button
if you want to transfer them to the Meals tab.

logs.title: Daily Logs
logs.help: Where you can see your progress in a tabular format.

charts.title: Progress Charts
charts.help:
Where you can view your progress in a chart. You can choose to
view only one of the variables by clicking on them. You can also control how
far back you want to see by using the slider.

error.invalidWeight: Weight must be between 0 and 999 kg
error.invalidServingSize: Serving size must be greater than 0
error.noUnit: Unit of measurement must be provided
